title: Kayle Visual is awesome!
body: You haters are just mad they made another beautiful skin. You don't get to decide what a woman wears. I can't wait to cosplay as her. Riot you did a fantastic job. She's fully covered and still sexy!

replies.body: Do you think Kayle was _forced_ to wear armor? Are we allowed to decide what a _man_ wears? Was Kayle _not_ sexy while suitably attired for battle?

"Everyone who has a different opinion than me is a hater who's jealous that riot made a good design"

I think there's only one appropriate response for this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nVZ2vk3PYPE
I think the visual update is pretty great.
It's simply divine. The sleekness, her curves, the armor, the color scheme. Just awesome.
Maybe she just likes sexy females to aspire to and is tired of being told what she can and can't like.
e girls just want all their champs to be super sexy so they have more sexy champs to play.
